description: This file defines a React functional component TopBar that provides a user interface with a button for creating new notes and a search input with debounced search functionality. It utilizes React hooks and interacts with context for managing notes.

methods.name: TopBar()
methods.description: React component rendering a header with a new note button and a search input with debounce functionality.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Handler for search input change; updates state and triggers debounced query update.
